Name: LIGHTING
checklistText:
<size=21>LIGHTING ACTIVATION & CHECKOUT</size>

1.
PANEL 3:
	LTG:
		SIDE PANELS sw - ON
		FLOOD sw - OVHD/FWD. then OFF, then ALL
		FLOOD cont - BRIGHT, then DIM, then adjust as desired
		EXTERIOR LTG sw - TRACK, then DOCK, then OFF

2.
PANEL 5:
	LTG:
		FLOOD cont - BRIGHT, then DIM, then adjust as desired
		ANUN/NUM cont - BRIGHT, then DIM
		OVERRIDE ANUN sw - ON, then OFF
		OVERRIDE NUM sw - ON, then OFF
		ANUN/NUM cont - adjust as desired
		INTEGRAL cont - BRIGHT, then DIM
		SIDE PANELS sw - ON
		OVERRIDE INTEGRAL sw - ON, then OFF
		INTEGRAL cont - adjust as desired
		* Configure side panels lights as desired
